sentences.sContent: We all see panda on TV or in the zoo.
sentences.sContent_eng: We all see panda on TV or in the zoo.
sentences.sCn: 我们在电视上或在动物园里能看到熊猫。

sentences.sContent: Today, , I go to the zoo with my friends, I never see so many animals before, I see the panda, the giraffe and the monkey.
sentences.sContent_eng: Today, , I go to the zoo with my friends, I never see so many animals before, I see the panda, the giraffe and the monkey.
sentences.sCn: 这天，我和朋友去动物园，我以前从来没看到那么多的动物，我看到了熊猫，长颈鹿和猴子。

trans.tranOther: a large black and white animal that looks like a bear and lives in the mountains of China
